Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI was a lot more lenient and thus marked my grades higher than my teachers.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI made me feel a lot better than my teacher.

Question 42.Response: GenAI gave feedback directly related to the rubric whereas the feedback provided by my teachers tended to be more holistic
